summary: This is a Municipal Credit Union direct deposit distribution request form for an account belonging to Clyde Washington, authorizing payroll distribution to a share account and a loan account. The form is signed by Arrion Fletcher, likely as a bank representative or employer contact.

events.title: Direct deposit authorization
events.description: Clyde Washington authorized Municipal Credit Union to distribute his payroll direct deposit to specified accounts, with a form signed by Arrion Fletcher.

keyFacts: Clyde Washington had a Municipal Credit Union account (number 1580663) with payroll direct deposits.
A direct deposit distribution request was signed on May 31, 2019, allocating funds to a share account and a loan account.
Arrion Fletcher authorized the form, indicating involvement in the financial transaction.
The document is a standard financial authorization form with no explicit mention of Epstein, victims, or illegal activities.
